boardgame.description: Munchkins have hacked their way through dungeons, kung fu temples, starships, haunted houses, and super-foes. Now they face their greatest challenge _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Cthulhu! Will they survive? Will they retain their sanity? Will they...level up?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Munchkin Cthulhu is a standalone game in the Munchkin universe, this time lampooning Lovecraft's Mythos and the horror gaming that surrounds it. This base game features four new Classes, including the Cultist, and a lot of classic monsters from outside reality _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; and they all have Stuff you can take from their twitching bodies. You can play Munchkin Cthulhu by itself, or combine it with any number of other Munchkin titles for mind-bending silliness._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Part of the Munchkin series._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Munchkin is a satirical card game based on the clich_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;s and oddities of Dungeons and Dragons and other role-playing games. Each player starts at level 1 and the winner is the first player to reach level 10. Players can acquire familiar D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp;D style character classes during the game which determine to some extent the cards they can play._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There are two types of cards - treasure and encounters. Each turn the current players 'kicks down the door' - drawing an encounter card from the deck. Usually this will involve battling a monster. Monsters have their own levels and players must try and overcome it using the levels, weapons and powers they have acquired during the game or run away. Other players can chose to help the player or hinder by adding extra monsters to the encounter. Defeating a monster will usually result in drawing treasure cards and acquiring levels. Being defeated by a monster results in _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;bad stuff_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; which usually involves losing levels and treasure._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes:
Munchkins have hacked their way through dungeons, kung fu temples, starships, haunted houses, and super-foes. Now they face their greatest challenge -- Cthulhu! Will they survive? Will they retain their sanity? Will they... level up? Munchkin Cthuhlu lampoons Lovecraft_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Mythos and the horror gaming that surrounds it. Brought to you by Steve Jackson and John Kovalic, this set features four new Classes -- including the Cultist -- and a lot of classic monsters from outside reality. And they all have Stuff you can take from their twitching bodies. You can play Munchkin Cthulhu by itself, or combine it with any number of other Munchkin games for mind-bending silliness.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Contents: 168 cards 1 die rules
Thank you for shopping with J and J Board Games! All our games are new and factory sealed unless stated otherwise. We normally have over 300 games listed on BGG, and we have over 100 feedback. We are an honest, family owned business, so buy with the confidence that a member of our immediate family will handle and package your order. We charge fair shipping and handling. (Usually the exact cost + a $.99 handling/packaging fee). SAVE MONEY! We will COMBINE shipping for mutliple item purchases. Just email us for a shipping quote. DOMESTIC ORDERS: Please email us for shipping costs before ordering. Include your zip code in your email to us, so that we can give you an accurate quote. We use USPS PRIORITY (2-3 DAY), or USPS FIRST CLASS (2-4 DAY)mail services. Both services include Delivery Confirmation. Insurance may be added for an additional $1.65. Orders from within North Dakota will include 6% sales tax. INTERNATIONAL ORDERS: Please email us for shipping costs. We use USPS PRIORITY INERNATIONAL (6-10 DAY), or USPS EXPRESS (3-5 DAY) services. Both services include Delivery Confirmation and Insurance. Thank you, Jeremy, Jennifer, and Family J and J Board Games

Steve Jackson Games (SJG1447) Munchkins have hacked their way through dungeons, kung fu temples, starships, haunted houses, and super-foes. Now they face their greatest challenge -- Cthulhu! Will they survive? Will they retain their sanity? Will they... level up? Munchkin Cthulhu is a stand-alone game in the Munchkin line, this time lampooning Lovecraft_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Mythos and the horror gaming that surrounds it. Brought to you by Steve Jackson (I) and John Kovalic, this set features four new Classes -- including the Cultist -- and a lot of classic monsters from outside reality. And they all have Stuff you can take from their twitching bodies. You can play Munchkin Cthulhu by itself, or combine it with any number of other Munchkin games for mind-bending silliness.
